featured.title: Attack on Titan
featured.description: Humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason.

episodes.title: To You, 2,000 Years in the Future
episodes.description: After 100 years of peace, humanity is suddenly reminded of the terror of being at the Titans' mercy.

episodes.title: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina
episodes.description: After the Titans break through the wall, the citizens of Shiganshina must run for their lives.

featured.title: Demon Slayer
featured.description: A young man's journey to cure his sister's demonic curse and avenge his family's death.

episodes.title: Cruelty
episodes.description: Tanjiro's life changes when he returns home to find his family slaughtered and his sister turned into a demon.

trending.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
trending.description: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

episodes.title: Ryomen Sukuna
episodes.description: Yuji Itadori encounters a cursed object that changes his life forever.

trending.title: My Hero Academia
trending.originalTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア
trending.description: In a world where 80% of the population has super powers, a boy without them aims to become the greatest hero.

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
episodes.description: In a world where people with superpowers known as 'Quirks' are the norm, Izuku Midoriya has dreams of enrolling in a prestigious hero academy and becoming a hero.

popular.title: One Punch Man
popular.description: The story of Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored by a lack of challenge.

episodes.title: The Strongest Man
episodes.description: Saitama, an unassociated hero, does heroic deeds for his own entertainment.

popular.title: Tokyo Revengers
popular.description: A man travels back in time to save his ex-girlfriend from being killed by a dangerous gang.

episodes.title: Reborn
episodes.description: Takemichi Hanagaki learns that his middle school girlfriend has been killed by the Tokyo Manji Gang.

newReleases.title: Chainsaw Man
newReleases.description: Following a betrayal, a young man left for dead is reborn as a powerful devil-human hybrid after merging with his pet devil and is soon enlisted by a government agency to fight against devils.

episodes.title: Dog & Chainsaw
episodes.description: Denji is a young man trapped in poverty, working off his deceased father's debt by harvesting devil corpses with the aid of his devil-dog Pochita.
